description:
Looking for an UI Web developer with JS and agular.js skills.
Remote development, 2-3 months contract, 40 hours a week. 

Skills Required:
At least 3 years of significant web development experience creating high-performance, modular JavaScript-driven sites.
Passion for UI and able to translate user interactions to dynamic web UIs
Solid experience in creating and optimising single-page web applications using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, angular.js in particular.
Solid experience in styling and theming using CSS3, as well as CSS pre-processing technologies such as LESS.
Hands-on experience in using SOAs REST APIs, JSON, JSONP to create dynamic web content.
Proficient with current agile engineering practices (Scrum or Kanban, user stories and agile estimation, Continuous Integration with Jenkins, Git workflows, Unit testing and automation) 
A good understanding of Cloud Computing and Infrastructure as a Service.
Good knowledge of Linux and command line shell interface.
A passion for open source software development and desire to contribute to the community.
Being a team player with proactive attitude to problem solving and good sense of humor.
Good verbal, presentation and written communications skills with good spoken and written English.

Plus
Experience in usability tests and UX design would be a big plus
Experience in Test Driven Development (TDD)/Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) would be a big plus

Please apply with a CV with JS + angular.js projects portfolio! Thanks.
title: UI Developer (JS + angular) for 2-3 months full-time

assignments.title: For Evgeniy B. - Titanium Bugs Fixing
